item.title: Need help on barrows chest
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

I’m trying to make the items come out randomly.
But it only seems that the first on the list is the only one that comes out of the chest.
Heres the code.

case 6774: if (objectID == 6774) { if (playerHasItem(7678)) { int[] itemsR = {4734, 4757, 4718, 4722, 4716, 4720, 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4753, 4755, 4759, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4723, 4736, 4738, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4724}; int i = (int) (Math.random() * itemR.length); addItem(itemsR[i], 1); sendMessage("You use a key and get an item!"); } else { sendMessage("You need the key to open the barrows chest."); } }

And here’s my error.

client.java:1833: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemR location: class client int i = (int) (Math.random() * itemR.length); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error

Read full topic
